Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to the transfer of the regional state park police to the division of state police; repealer
Summary: Provides for the transfer of the regional state park police to the division of state police; and repeals certain provisions related thereto.
LawCode: Amd §58, Civ Serv L; amd §§381-b & 363-b, R & SS L; rpld §9.05 sub 4, §13.17, Pks & Rec L; amd §1.20, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, the retirement and social security law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to transferring the regional state park police to the division of state police; and to repeal certain provisions of the parks, recreation and historic preservation law, relating thereto
